hadiths.text: It is reporter on the authority of Abu Huraira that the Messenger of Allah (may peace and blessings be upon him) observed:There came the people of Yemen who are soft of hearts, tender in feelings: the belief is that of the Yemenites, the sagacity is that of the Yemenites and the summit of unbelief is towards the East

chapter.ara-name: باب تَفَاضُلِ أَهْلِ الإِيمَانِ فِيهِ وَرُجْحَانِ أَهْلِ الْيَمَنِ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: People excel over one another in faith, and the superiority of the people of Yemen in faith
